level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: ยง 13-662 Definitions. As used in this article: The term "police retired employee" shall mean any person who was retired for service on or after June fifth, nineteen hundred sixty and prior to May first, nineteen hundred sixty-three and receives, as a result of such retirement, a retirement allowance or pension from a retirement or pension system or plan of the city for members of the uniformed force of the police department.
